TITLE: Kiosk Settings
DISPLAY_ROT_DOC: Choose how you want to rotate the display.
TOUCH_ROT_DOC: On some system, may be different from Display Rotation. Adjust here.
MOUSE_C_DOC: If enabled, the mouse cursor is hidden when not use.
SCREENSAVER_DOC: Set the timeout before screensaver in seconds. 0 = no screensaver.
XSCREENSAVER: Xscreensaver, a set of nice screensavers
NO_SS_IF_PLAY_DOC: Disable screensaver when playing. Timeout is aplied when stop plyaing.
